# Assessment 1 - Online Quizzes {#A1_1 .unnumbered}

You will complete four online quizzes that will test your understanding
of the learning content in this unit. Each quiz is worth 5%. This
assessment makes up a total of 20% of your mark for this unit. Each quiz
should be completed on LMS by the due date. The due date for each quiz
can be seen in the Unit Outline and an announcement will be made when
each quiz becomes available.

## Learning Objective {.unnumbered}

At the completion of these quizzes learners will have:

-   demonstrated an ability to explain key hydrological concepts and
    processes
